channel.title: Need help with some error on compiling and runserver.... PLEASE LOOK!
channel.description:
Well, every server i own, about 5-8. I always use the perfect compile - Mod Taharok -, But the server i have just downloaded, a server called Pvpscape. I edit the compiler, to the perfect compiler. and on compile... it says... like... You do not have the Java files to compile this server.
press any key to continue. . .
So i try just to runeserver. And it says. You do not have a server.class. Make sure you compiler with the server BEFORE running it.
press any key to continue. . .
So then i was thinking hmm.... Lets try the compiler thats been given which was.... @echo off COLOR f0 set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0 set jac=\bin\javac.exe if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles="C:\Program Files (x86) cls :c cls title Compiler goto cjc :c2 %javac% -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java echo. echo This compiler is based on Mod Taharok's compiler echo The original can be found on www.moparisthebest.com/smf echo. pause exit :cjc if exist "%pro%_06%jac%" (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2) :cjc2 if exist "%pro%_07%jac%" (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3) :cjc3 if exist "%pro%_08%jac%" (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4) :cjc4 if exist "%pro%_09%jac%" (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5) :cjc5 if exist "%pro%_10%jac%" (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6) :cjc6 if exist "%pro2%%jac%" (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7) :cjc7 if exist "%pro%%jac%" (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8) :cjc8 if exist "%pro%_01%jac%" (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9) :cjc9 if exist "%pro%_02%jac%" (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10) :cjc10 if exist "%pro%_03%jac%" (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11) :cjc11 if exist "%pro%_04%jac%" (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12) :cjc12 if exist "%pro%_05%jac%" (goto sjc12) else (goto je) :sjc set javac="%pro%_06%jac%" goto c2 :sjc2 set javac="%pro%_07%jac%" goto c2 :sjc3 set javac="%pro%_08%jac%" goto c2 :sjc4 set javac="%pro%_09%jac%" goto c2 :sjc5 set javac="%pro%_10%jac%" goto c2 :sjc6 set javac="%pro2%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc7 set javac="%pro%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc8 set javac="%pro%_01%jac%" goto c2 :sjc9 set javac="%pro%_02%jac%" goto c2 :sjc10 set javac="%pro%_03%jac%" goto c2 :sjc11 set javac="%pro%_04%jac%" goto c2 :sjc12 set javac="%pro%_05%jac%" goto c2 :cl cls goto c5 :je echo You don't have Java installed on this computer echo Get it pause
I click it and it says. like depricatoin -xlint. So it works fine.
Then when it comes to runserver... I double click it and it comes up for like 0.2 seconds. then auto shuts... and in the runserver it says the following. @echo off COLOR f0 title PvpScape PK Server set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./Class; server
If anyone knows how to fix this problem PLEASE PLEASE POST! BACK!

item.title: Need help with some error on compiling and runserver.... PLEASE LOOK!
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

Well, every server i own, about 5-8. I always use the perfect compile - Mod Taharok -, But the server i have just downloaded, a server called Pvpscape. I edit the compiler, to the perfect compiler. and on compile… it says… like… You do not have the Java files to compile this server.

press any key to continue. . .

So i try just to runeserver. And it says. You do not have a server.class. Make sure you compiler with the server BEFORE running it.

press any key to continue. . .

So then i was thinking hmm…
Lets try the compiler thats been given which was…
@echo off
COLOR f0
set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0
set jac=\bin\javac.exe
if exist “C:\Program Files (x86)” set programfiles=“C:\Program Files (x86)
cls
:c
cls
title Compiler
goto cjc
:c2
%javac% -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java
echo.
echo This compiler is based on Mod Taharok’s compiler
echo The original can be found on www.moparisthebest.com/smf
echo.
pause
exit
:cjc
if exist “%pro%_06%jac%” (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2)
:cjc2
if exist “%pro%_07%jac%” (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3)
:cjc3
if exist “%pro%_08%jac%” (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4)
:cjc4
if exist “%pro%_09%jac%” (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5)
:cjc5
if exist “%pro%_10%jac%” (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6)
:cjc6
if exist “%pro2%%jac%” (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7)
:cjc7
if exist “%pro%%jac%” (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8)
:cjc8
if exist “%pro%_01%jac%” (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9)
:cjc9
if exist “%pro%_02%jac%” (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10)
:cjc10
if exist “%pro%_03%jac%” (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11)
:cjc11
if exist “%pro%_04%jac%” (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12)
:cjc12
if exist “%pro%_05%jac%” (goto sjc12) else (goto je)
:sjc
set javac=”%pro%_06%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc2
set javac="%pro%_07%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc3
set javac="%pro%_08%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc4
set javac="%pro%_09%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc5
set javac="%pro%_10%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc6
set javac="%pro2%%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc7
set javac="%pro%%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc8
set javac="%pro%_01%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc9
set javac="%pro%_02%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc10
set javac="%pro%_03%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc11
set javac="%pro%_04%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc12
set javac="%pro%_05%jac%"
goto c2
:cl
cls
goto c5
:je
echo You don’t have Java installed on this computer
echo Get it
pause

I click it and it says. like depricatoin -xlint. So it works fine.

Then when it comes to runserver…
I double click it and it comes up for like 0.2 seconds. then auto shuts… and in the runserver it says the following.
@echo off
COLOR f0
title PvpScape PK Server
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./Class; server

If anyone knows how to fix this problem PLEASE PLEASE POST! BACK!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with some error on compiling and runserver.... PLEASE LOOK!
